QuestData.Title: Old Enemies
QuestData.Description: To think, we were once on the same side! The Sunreavers' treachery caught us all off guard. Never again!$b$bThey have shown their true natures to us. Siding with Garrosh and his madness has marked them all for death.$b$bKill any agent of the Sunreavers that you find. We will show them no mercy here.
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill 10 Sunreaver agents or players on the Isle of Thunder.
